Headline: #79 79th Temporary Reroute at 79th/Racine
ShortDescription: 79 79th  buses are temporarily rerouted via 79th, Loomis, 76th, Halsted, 79th and over regular route: due to, street blockage near 79th/Racine.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

#79 79th  buses are temporarily rerouted via 79th, Loomis, 76th, Halsted, 79th and over regular route: due to, street blockage near 79th/Racine.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #20 Madison Temporary Westbound Reroute near Madison/Menard
ShortDescription: Westbound 20 Madison buses are temporarily rerouted via Madison, Central, Washington and Austin: due to, fire department activity near Madison/Menard.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #20 Madison buses are temporarily rerouted via Madison, Central, Washington and Austin: due to, fire department activity near Madison/Menard.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #94 California Temporary Reroute near 51st/California
ShortDescription: 94 California buses temp. rerouted : due to, street blockage near 51st/California.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#94 California buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 51st/California due to street blockage near 51st/California.

Northbound buses will operate via California, 55th and Western including the normal route streets.

Southbound buses will operate via California, 47th, Western, 55th and California.

Allow extra travel time.

ShortDescription: 51 51st buses are temporarily rerouted via 51st, Western, 55th, California and 51st: due to, street blockage near 51st/California.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:

Headline: 95th/Dan Ryan-bound Subway Trains Rerouted to Elevated Tracks
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are temporarily rerouted to the elevated tracks between Fullerton and Cermak due to police activity at Lake.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are temporarily rerouted to the elevated tracks between Fullerton and Cermak due to police activity at Lake.

Red Line service to 95th/Dan Ryan

After stopping at Fullerton, 95th-bound trains will be diverted and will make the following elevated station stops:

  • Armitage (accessible)
  • Sedgwick (accessible)
  • Chicago (at Franklin; accessible)
  • Merchandise Mart (accessible)
  • Clark/lake (accessible)
  • State/Lake
  • Washington/Wabash (accessible)
  • Adams/Wabash
  • Roosevelt (elevated station west of Wabash; accessible)

Then, trains will stop at Cermak-Chinatown and make all normal stops to 95th/Dan Ryan.

Connections can be made between Howard-bound subway service and 95th-bound rerouted service via elevated lines at Fullerton (accessible), State/Lake (board at nearby elevated station on Orange Line side for 95th-bound Red Line service) and at Roosevelt (accessible).

We apologize for the inconvenience and are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.

Howard-bound service is not affected.

Headline: Howard- bound Red Line trains bypassing Lake
ShortDescription: Howard- bound Red Line trains are running, but not stopping at Lake due to police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard- bound Red Line trains are running, but not stopping at Lake due to police activity.

We apologize for this inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.
